prompts: Create a robotic Pokemon with a metallic blue body and red eyes that looks intimidating.
Imagine a giant steel creature that can levitate and has a distinctive X shape on its body.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a futuristic machine with sharp claws and a cool color palette.
Show me a powerful psychic-type Pokemon that has a strong presence and a mysterious aura.
Design a Pokemon that can blend into rocky terrains and has a unique geometric appearance.
Give me a Pokemon that feels both ancient and high-tech, with features that represent strength and intelligence.
Make a Pokemon that embodies both steel and psychic elements, showcasing a blend of power and wisdom.
